comments.author: maikrothaman
comments.body: Quote from: ranegg on December 10, 2022, 11:54:15 AMHey!a web dev here.One year ago I started developing my own crypto gambling casino and now I am at the stage where I need an investor to join me as a partner, in return he gets a percentage of the profits.Budget needed: $5000-$10000If this is something that interests you contact me for a more serious talk.Telegram: hapeTHE1337Discord: ZapeKing#1405Give me the specifics in a private message. Since I am an angel investor, I have fund small projects with disruptive tech. Essentially, I want to know how much you have built, who is on your team, and how you plan to enter the market (strategies, etc. ).

comments.author: ranlo
comments.body: You should really be adding more information to the post. It's a lot of work to go deal with this 1:1 with each person when 99% of the questions/details could just be given to everyone at once. It's likely why nobody is showing interest in even learning.

comments.author: ranlo
comments.body: Quote from: ranegg on February 04, 2023, 03:33:37 PMSome screenshots: https://imgur.com/a/cwl5GefDid you design this entirely by yourself? Or is it a third-party script?

comments.author: Don Pedro Dinero
comments.body: With the few details you give, I'm not surprised you don't have more answers. The offers that appear on forums that are not very transparent are not usually reliable. Do you really think that without answering anything and bumping the thread from time to time you are going to get a serious investor? Maybe you're lucky but it's not usual.Quote from: ranlo on February 02, 2023, 03:53:59 PMYou should really be adding more information to the post. It's a lot of work to go deal with this 1:1 with each person when 99% of the questions/details could just be given to everyone at once. It's likely why nobody is showing interest in even learning.I agree.
